attributes.action: Abolish the 1 per cent bracket of Stamp Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 1 per cent bracket of Stamp Duty currently affects home purchases valued between £125,000 and £250,000.  The average house price now exceeds £200,000.  More than half of home purchases are covered even though the tax was only intended to affect the wealthy.  As a first step, the 1 per cent bracket should be abolished, this would cost around £1.75 billion in 2007-08 but would be an important first step to assisting homebuyers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
